text: Legnica () is a city in Poland. The river Katzbach runs through Legnica. There live over 100,000 people. The city is in west part of Poland (near Germany and Czech border). Legnica is near a bigger city, Wrocław. Legnica is in the middle of Silesia. The area used to be part of Prussia, and Legnica was the capital of one of the three Silesian government areas (Regierungsbezirk). ==History== Liegnitz Administration Country: German Empire State: Prussia Province: Silesia Admin. region: Liegnitz Basic statistics Population: 83.701 (1939) Coordinates: 51° 13' 0" N, 16° 10' 0" O Time zone: UTC+1 (MEZ) Silesia, a Prussian Province, was divided in 3 administrative regions (Regierungsbezirk): Liegnitz, Breslau and Oppeln.
